question:
Let \(f(x) = x{{\text{e}}^{ - x}}\) and \(g(x) =  - 3f(x) + 1\).

The graphs of \(f\) and \(g\) intersect at \(x = p\) and \(x = q\), where \(p < q\).

Find the value of \(p\) and of \(q\).

[3]
a.

Hence, find the area of the region enclosed by the graphs of \(f\) and \(g\).

[3]
b.
